trans-unit.source: Check your reverse DNS to make sure the IP address of your mail server points to the domain name that you use for sending mail.

trans-unit.source: Although there are portions of this answer that apply to only to the usage of themail() function itself, many of these troubleshooting steps can be applied to any PHP mailing system.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此答案的某些部分仅适用于使用 mail() 函数本身，但是许多故障排除步骤都可以应用于任何PHP邮件系统。

trans-unit.source: Sendmail installation for Debian 10.0.0 ('Buster') was in fact trivial!
trans-unit.target: Debian 10.0.0（“ Buster”）的Sendmail安装实际上很简单！

trans-unit.source: For those who do not want to use external mailers and want to mail() on a dedicated Linux server.
trans-unit.target: 对于那些不想使用外部邮件程序并希望在专用Linux服务器上使用mail（）的用户。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have Sendmail installed in your server.
trans-unit.target: 确保在服务器中安装了Sendmail。

trans-unit.source: A mail library (PHPMailer, Zend Framework 2+, etc.), does something very different from mail. They open a socket directly to the receiving mail server and then send the SMTP mail commands directly over that socket. In other words, the class acts as its own MTA (note that you can tell the libraries to use mail to ultimately send the mail, but I would strongly recommend you not do that).
trans-unit.target: 邮件库（ PHPMailer ，Zend Framework 2+等）的功能与 mail 完全不同。 他们直接打开一个到接收邮件服务器的套接字，然后直接通过该套接字发送SMTP邮件命令。 换句话说，该类充当其自己的MTA（请注意，您可以告诉库使用 mail 来最终发送邮件，但我强烈建议您不要这样做）。

trans-unit.source: Add a mail header in the mail function:
trans-unit.target: 在邮件功能中增加一个邮件标题。

trans-unit.source: All of which can be combined with a professional SMTP server/service provider. (Because typical 08/15 shared webhosting plans are hit or miss when it comes to email setup/configurability.)
trans-unit.target: 这些都可以与专业的SMTP服务器服务提供商结合起来。(因为典型的0815共享虚拟主机计划在邮件设置配置方面的可操作性很差。)

trans-unit.source: Also make sure you have the correct order of variables in your mail() function.
trans-unit.target: 同时确保你的mail()函数中的变量顺序正确。

trans-unit.source: Always try sending headers in the mail function.
trans-unit.target: 总是在邮件功能中尝试发送头像。

trans-unit.source: An email to their technical support (after a trip to their online support or FAQ) should clarify if email capabilities are available on your server.
trans-unit.target: 向他们的技术支持发送电子邮件(在访问他们的在线支持或常见问题之后),应该可以澄清您的服务器上是否有电子邮件功能。

trans-unit.target: 而我的示例代码是:

trans-unit.target: 还有一件事情。 mail() 函数在localhost中不起作用。 将您的代码上传到服务器，然后尝试。

trans-unit.target: 另一种测试方法是将收件人值硬编码到 mail() 函数调用中：

trans-unit.source: As far as the $from variable goes, that should automatically come from your webhost if your using the Linux cPanel. It automatically comes from your cPanel username and IP address.
trans-unit.target: 就 $from 变量而言，如果使用Linux cPanel ，那应该自动来自您的Web主机。 它自动来自您的cPanel用户名和IP地址。

trans-unit.source: Basic usage:
trans-unit.target: 基本用法:

trans-unit.source: Check for Port connection failure
trans-unit.target: 检查端口连接故障

trans-unit.source: Check spam folders; prevent emails from being flagged as spam
trans-unit.target: 检查垃圾邮件文件夹,防止邮件被标记为垃圾邮件。

trans-unit.source: Check the mail() return value
trans-unit.target: 检查 mail() 返回值

trans-unit.source: Check the server's mail logs
trans-unit.target: 检查服务器的邮件日志

trans-unit.source: Check with a mail testing service
trans-unit.target: 向邮件测试服务机构查询

trans-unit.source: Different MTAs can implement sendmail. They just make a symbolic link to their binaries on that name. For example, in Debian the default is Postfix. Configure your MTA to send mail and test it from the console with sendmail -v -t -i < message.txt. File message.txt should contain all headers of a message and a body, destination address for the envelope will be taken from the To: header. Example:
trans-unit.target: 不同的MTA可以实现 sendmail 。 他们只是在该名称上建立了指向其二进制文件的符号链接。 例如，在Debian中 ，默认值为Postfix 。 配置您的MTA以发送邮件，并使用 sendmail -v -t -i < message.txt 从控制台对其进行测试。 文件 message.txt 应该包含消息的所有标头和正文，信封的目标地址将从 To: 标头中获取。 例：

trans-unit.source: Don't use a faux From: sender
trans-unit.target: 不要使用伪造的 From: 发件人

trans-unit.source: Don't use the error suppression operator
trans-unit.target: 不要使用错误抑制运算符

trans-unit.source: Enable PHP's custom mail.log
trans-unit.target: 启用PHP的自定义 mail.log

trans-unit.source: Enter directly the email address when sending the email:
trans-unit.target: 发送邮件时直接输入邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: Error reporting is essential to rooting out bugs in your code and general errors that PHP encounters. Error reporting needs to be enabled to receive these errors. Placing the following code at the top of your PHP files (or in a master configuration file) will enable error reporting.
trans-unit.target: 错误报告对于根除代码中的BUG和PHP遇到的一般错误至关重要。错误报告需要启用错误报告来接收这些错误。将下面的代码放在 PHP 文件的顶部(或在主配置文件中)将启用错误报告功能。

trans-unit.source: Finally, make it really easy to unsubscribe. Otherwise, your users will unsubscribe by pressing the spam button, and that will affect your reputation.
trans-unit.target: 最后，取消订阅真的很容易。 否则，您的用户将通过按垃圾邮件按钮退订，这将影响您的声誉。

trans-unit.source: First of all, you might have too many parameters for the mail() function... You are able to have of maximum of five, mail(to, subject, message, headers, parameters);
trans-unit.target: 首先，您可能为mail（）函数设置了太多参数...您最多可以有五个（ mail(to, subject, message, headers, parameters);

trans-unit.source: For anyone who finds this going forward, I would not recommend using mail. There's some answers that touch on this, but not the why of it.
trans-unit.target: 对于发现这种情况的任何人，我建议您不要使用 mail 。 有一些与此有关的答案，但不是其原因 。

trans-unit.source: Here is my configuration for my account on Yandex mail:
trans-unit.target: 以下是我在Yandex mail上的账户配置。

trans-unit.source: I created my email sending this way:
trans-unit.target: 我创建了我的邮件发送方式是这样的。

trans-unit.source: I prefer to use ssmtp as MTA because it is simple and does not require running a daemon with opened ports. ssmtp fits only for sending mail from localhost. It also can send authenticated email via your account on a public mail service. Install ssmtp and edit configuration file /etc/ssmtp/ssmtp.conf. To be able also to receive local system mail to Unix accounts (alerts to root from cron jobs, for example) configure /etc/ssmtp/revaliases file.
trans-unit.target: 我更喜欢将ssmtp用作MTA，因为它很简单并且不需要使用打开的端口运行守护程序。 ssmtp仅适合从localhost发送邮件。 它还可以通过您在公共邮件服务上的帐户发送经过身份验证的电子邮件。 安装ssmtp并编辑配置文件 /etc/ssmtp/ssmtp.conf 。 为了也能够接收到本地系统邮件到Unix帐户（例如，从cron作业向root发出警报），请配置 /etc/ssmtp/revaliases 文件。

trans-unit.source: I think this should do the trick. I just added an if(isset and added concatenation to the variables in the body to separate PHP from HTML.
trans-unit.target: 我认为这应该可以解决问题。 我只是添加了一个 if(isset ，并将串联添加到主体中的变量中，以将PHP与HTML分开。

trans-unit.source: I usually use SwiftMailer whenever I need to send mails with PHP.
trans-unit.target: 每当我需要用PHP发送邮件时,我通常会使用SwiftMailer。

trans-unit.source: I've tried creating a simple mail form. The form itself is on my index.html page, but it submits to a separate "thank you for your submission" page, thankyou.php, where the above PHP code is embedded. The code submits perfectly, but never sends an email. How can I fix this?
trans-unit.target: 我尝试创建一个简单的邮件表单。 表单本身在我的 index.html 页面上，但是它提交到单独的“感谢您提交”页面， thankyou.php ，上面的PHP代码嵌入其中。 该代码可以完美提交，但从不发送电子邮件。 我怎样才能解决这个问题？

trans-unit.source: If it is empty, you will need to do a:
trans-unit.target: 如果是空的,你需要做一个。

trans-unit.source: If the emails arrive at all or some of the other email accounts, you know your code is sending emails but it is likely that the email account provider is blocking them for some reason. If the email does not arrive at any email account, the problem is more likely to be related to your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果邮件全部或部分邮件到达其他邮件账户,说明你知道你的代码正在发送邮件,但很可能是邮件账户提供商由于某种原因阻止了它们。如果邮件没有到达任何一个邮件账户,那么问题很可能与你的代码有关。

trans-unit.source: If you are developing on your local workstation using WAMP, MAMP, or XAMPP, an email server is probably not installed on your workstation. Without one, PHP cannot send mail by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用WAMP、MAMP或XAMPP在本地工作站上开发,那么你的工作站上可能没有安装邮件服务器。如果没有安装,PHP默认无法发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: If you are running this code on a local server (i.e your computer for development purposes) it won't send the email to the recipient. It will create a .txt file in a folder named mailoutput.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在本地服务器（即用于开发目的的计算机）上运行此代码，则不会将电子邮件发送给收件人。 它将在名为 mailoutput 的文件夹中创建一个 .txt 文件。

trans-unit.source: If you are sending mail through a server then check the email sending feature is enabled on your server.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是通过服务器发送邮件,那么请检查你的服务器上是否启用了邮件发送功能。

trans-unit.source: If you are sending mail through localhost then do the SMTP settings for sending mail.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是通过localhost发送邮件,那么请进行SMTP设置,以发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: If you are sure that the service provider supports the mail() function, you can check this PHP manual for further reference,
trans-unit.target: 如果你确定服务提供者支持mail()函数,你可以查看这本PHP手册来进一步参考。

trans-unit.source: If you are using an SMTP configuration for sending your email, try using PHPMailer instead. You can download the library from https://github.com/PHPMailer/PHPMailer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用SMTP配置发送电子邮件，请尝试使用PHPMailer 。 您可以从https://github.com/PHPMailer/PHPMailer下载该库。

trans-unit.source: If you have checked your code and verified that there is nothing wrong there, go to /var/mail and check whether that folder is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果你已经检查了你的代码,并确认那里没有问题,请到varmail中检查该文件夹是否为空。

trans-unit.source: If you have set your form method to POST, make sure you are using $_POST to look for your form values. If you have set it to GET or didn't set it at all, make sure you using $_GET to look for your form values.
trans-unit.target: 如果将表单方法设置为 POST ，请确保使用 $_POST 查找表单值。 如果已将其设置为 GET 或根本没有设置，请确保使用 $_GET 查找表单值。

trans-unit.source: If you only use the mail()function, you need to complete the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅使用 mail() 函数，则需要完成配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a FALSE return value you know the error lies with your server accepting your mail. This probably isn't a coding issue but a server configuration issue. You need to speak to your system administrator to find out why this is happening.
trans-unit.target: 如果收到 FALSE 返回值，则说明错误在于服务器接受您的邮件。 这可能不是编码问题，而是服务器配置问题。 您需要与系统管理员联系，以找出发生这种情况的原因。

trans-unit.source: If you think your host has emailing limits or blocks the sending of emails, check their FAQs to see if they list any such limitations. Otherwise, you may need to reach out to their support to verify if there are any restrictions in place around the sending of emails.
trans-unit.target: 如果您认为您的主机有电子邮件发送限制或阻止发送电子邮件,请查看他们的常见问题,看看他们是否列出了任何此类限制。否则,您可能需要联系他们的支持部门,以确认是否有任何限制发送电子邮件的限制。

trans-unit.source: If you're going to a university that runs XAMPP from www.AceITLab.com, you should know what our professor didn't tell us: The AceITLab firewall (not the Windows firewall) blocks MercuryMail in XAMPP. You'll have to use an alternative mail client, pear is working for us. You'll have to send to a Gmail account with low security settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果你要去运行XAMPP的大学www.AceITLab.com,你应该知道我们的教授没有告诉我们什么。AceITLab的防火墙(不是Windows防火墙)阻止了XAMPP中的MercuryMail。你必须使用其他的邮件客户端,pear对我们来说是有效的。你必须发送到安全设置较低的Gmail账户中。

trans-unit.source: If you're having trouble sending mails with PHP, consider an alternative like PHPMailer or SwiftMailer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在使用PHP发送邮件时遇到麻烦，请考虑使用PHPMailer或SwiftMailer之类的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: If you're using SMTP (i.e. you're calling isSMTP()), you can get a detailed transcript of the SMTP conversation using the SMTPDebug property.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是SMTP（即，调用 isSMTP() ），则可以使用 SMTPDebug 属性获得SMTP对话的详细记录。

trans-unit.source: If your call to mail() does not have the correct parameters in the correct order it will also fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果您对 mail() 的调用没有正确顺序的正确参数，也会失败。

trans-unit.source: If your code contains @mail(...) then you may be hiding important error messages that will help you debug this. Remove the @ and see if any errors are reported.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的代码包含 @mail(...) ,则可能隐藏了重要的错误消息，这些消息将帮助您进行调试。 删除 @ ,然后查看是否报告了任何错误。

trans-unit.source: If your receive a TRUE return value it does not mean your email will definitely be sent. It just means the email was sent to its respective handler on the server successfully by PHP. There are still more points of failure outside of PHP's control that can cause the email to not be sent.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到的返回值为 TRUE ，则并不意味着一定会发送您的电子邮件。 这只是意味着电子邮件已被PHP成功发送到服务器上的相应处理程序。 在PHP的控制范围之外，还有更多故障点可能导致电子邮件无法发送。

trans-unit.source: In addition to your MTA's and PHP's log file, you can enable logging for the mail() function specifically. It doesn't record the complete SMTP interaction, but at least function call parameters and invocation script.
trans-unit.target: 除了您的MTA和PHP的日志文件之外，您还可以专门启用 mail() 函数的日志记录 。 它不记录完整的SMTP交互，但至少记录函数调用参数和调用脚本。

trans-unit.source: In the case if you are using a free hosing service, like 000webhost or hostinger, those service providers disable the mail() function to prevent unintended uses of email spoofing, spamming, etc. I prefer you to contact them to see whether they support this feature.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是免费 hostinger 服务（例如 000webhost 或Hostinger） ，则这些服务提供商将禁用 mail() 函数以防止意外使用电子邮件欺骗，垃圾邮件等。我希望您与他们联系以查看他们是否支持此功能。特征。

trans-unit.source: Invalid headers are just as bad as having no headers. One incorrect character could be all it takes to derail your email. Double-check to make sure your syntax is correct as PHP will not catch these errors for you.
trans-unit.target: 无效的标题与没有标题一样糟糕。 一个不正确的字符可能就是使您的电子邮件出轨的全部原因。 仔细检查以确保语法正确，因为PHP 不会为您捕获这些错误。

trans-unit.source: It is a plugin that has everything necessary to send mail, and the only thing you have to take into account is to have the SMTP port (Port: 25 and 465), enabled.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个插件,它拥有发送邮件所需的一切,唯一需要考虑的就是SMTP端口(端口:25和465),启用。

trans-unit.source: It may seem silly but a common error is to forget to actually place the mail() function in your code. Make sure it is there and not commented out.
trans-unit.target: 这似乎很愚蠢，但是一个常见的错误是忘记将 mail() 函数实际放在代码中。 确保它在那里并且没有被注释掉。

trans-unit.source: It worked for me on 000webhost by doing the following:
trans-unit.target: 我在000webhost上做了以下工作:

trans-unit.source: It works for me!
trans-unit.target: 它对我很有效!

trans-unit.source: It's only advisable when you check with error_get_last() right afterwards for concrete failures.
trans-unit.target: 仅当您之后立即使用 error_get_last() 检查具体故障时，才建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: Just add some headers before sending mail:
trans-unit.target: 在发送邮件前添加一些标题就可以了。

trans-unit.source: Likewise featureful: SwiftMailer
trans-unit.target: 同样具有特色： SwiftMailer

trans-unit.source: Make sure all mail headers are supplied
trans-unit.target: 确保提供了所有的邮件标题

trans-unit.source: Make sure error reporting is enabled and set to report all errors
trans-unit.target: 确保错误报告已启用并设置为报告所有错误。

trans-unit.source: Make sure mail headers have no syntax errors
trans-unit.target: 确保邮件标题没有语法错误。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the IP-address that you're using is not on a blacklist
trans-unit.target: 确保您使用的IP地址不在黑名单中

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the reply-to address is a valid, existing address.
trans-unit.target: 确保回复到的地址是一个有效的、现有的地址。

trans-unit.source: Make sure the localhost mail server is configured
trans-unit.target: 确保已配置 localhost 邮件服务器

trans-unit.source: Make sure the mail() function is called
trans-unit.target: 确保已调用 mail() 函数

trans-unit.source: Make sure the mail() function is called correctly
trans-unit.target: 确保正确调用了 mail() 函数

trans-unit.source: Make sure the Web host supports sending email
trans-unit.target: 确保网络主机支持发送电子邮件

trans-unit.source: Make sure the code matches the form method
trans-unit.target: 确保代码与表单方法匹配

trans-unit.source: Make sure the recipient value is correct
trans-unit.target: 确保收件人的值是正确的

trans-unit.source: Make sure your form action attribute contains a value that points to your PHP mailing code.
trans-unit.target: 确保您的表单 action 属性包含一个指向您的PHP邮件代码的值。

trans-unit.source: Make sure your form action value points to the correct location
trans-unit.target: 确保您的表单 action 值指向正确的位置

trans-unit.source: Make sure your hosting provider allows you to send emails and does not limit mail sending
trans-unit.target: 确保你的主机提供商允许你发送邮件,并且不限制邮件的发送。

trans-unit.source: Many shared webhosts, especially free webhosting providers, either do not allow emails to be sent from their servers or limit the amount that can be sent during any given time period. This is due to their efforts to limit spammers from taking advantage of their cheaper services.
trans-unit.target: 许多共享网站托管商,特别是免费的网站托管商,要么不允许从他们的服务器上发送电子邮件,要么限制在任何时间段内可以发送的邮件数量。这是由于他们努力限制垃圾邮件发送者利用他们的廉价服务而造成的。

trans-unit.source: Maybe the problem is the configuration of the mail server. To avoid this type of problems or you do not have to worry about the mail server problem, I recommend you use PHPMailer.
trans-unit.target: 可能问题是邮件服务器的配置。 为了避免此类问题，或者您不必担心邮件服务器问题，建议您使用PHPMailer 。

trans-unit.source: Miscellaneous useful commands:
trans-unit.target: 杂项有用的命令。

trans-unit.source: Monitor your abuse accounts, such as abuse@yourdomain.com and postmaster@yourdomain.com. That means - make sure that these accounts exist, read what's sent to them, and act on complaints.
trans-unit.target: 监控你的滥用账户,如abuse@yourdomain.com、postmaster@yourdomain.com。这意味着----确保这些账户的存在,阅读发送给他们的内容,并根据投诉采取行动。

trans-unit.source: Most of the hosting providers block these email ports to protect their network from sending any spam emails.
trans-unit.target: 大多数主机提供商都会屏蔽这些邮件端口,以保护他们的网络,防止发送任何垃圾邮件。

trans-unit.source: Most popular being: PHPMailer
trans-unit.target: 最受欢迎的是： PHPMailer

trans-unit.source: Mostly the mail() function is disabled in shared hosting. A better option is to use SMTP. The best option would be Gmail or SendGrid.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在共享托管中禁用 mail() 函数。 更好的选择是使用SMTP。 最好的选择是Gmail或SendGrid。

trans-unit.source: Note: <<<EOB syntax requires the last EOB marker begins as the beginning pf the line and has no space or whatever character after the semicolon.
trans-unit.target: 注意： <<<EOB 语法要求最后一个EOB标记从行首开始，并且在分号后没有空格或任何字符。

trans-unit.source: Of notable interest:
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是:

trans-unit.source: Oftentimes, for various reasons, emails sent through PHP (and other server-side programming languages) end up in a recipient's spam folder. Always check there before troubleshooting your code.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,由于各种原因,通过PHP(和其他服务器端编程语言)发送的邮件最终会进入收件人的垃圾邮件文件夹。在排除代码故障之前,请务必在那里检查。

trans-unit.source: Or even the older PEAR::Mail.
trans-unit.target: 甚至是较旧的PEAR :: Mail 。

trans-unit.source: PHP mail function doesn't complete sending of e-mail
trans-unit.target: PHP邮件功能无法完成邮件的发送。

trans-unit.source: PHP mail()
trans-unit.target: PHP mail()

trans-unit.source: PHP's mail function is not only opaque, it fully relies on whatever MTA you use (i.e. Sendmail) to do the work. mail will only tell you if the MTA failed to accept it (i.e. Sendmail was down when you tried to send). It cannot tell you if the mail was successful because it's handed it off. As such (as John Conde's answer details), you now get to fiddle with the logs of the MTA and hope that it tells you enough about the failure to fix it. If you're on a shared host or don't have access to the MTA logs, you're out of luck. Sadly, the default for most vanilla installs for Linux handle it this way.
trans-unit.target: PHP的 mail 功能不仅不透明，而且完全依赖于您使用的任何MTA （即Sendmail ）来完成工作。 mail 只会告诉您MTA是否无法接受（即，当您尝试发送时，Sendmail已关闭）。 它无法告诉您邮件是否成功，因为它已被传递。 这样（如John Conde的回答详细信息），您现在可以摆弄MTA的日志，并希望它告诉您有关修复它的失败的足够信息。 如果您在共享主机上，或者无法访问MTA日志，那么您就不走运了。 可悲的是，大多数Linux原始安装的默认设置都是以这种方式处理的。

trans-unit.source: PHP's built in mail() function is handy and often gets the job done but it has its shortcomings. Fortunately there are alternatives that offer more power and flexibility including handling a lot of the issues outlined above:
trans-unit.target: PHP的内置 mail() 函数很方便，通常可以完成工作，但是它有缺点 。 幸运的是，有一些替代方案可以提供更大的功能和灵活性，包括处理上面概述的许多问题：

trans-unit.source: Parameter sendmail-path describes how sendmail is called. The default value is sendmail -t -i, so if you get a working sendmail -t -i < message.txt in the Linux console - you will be done. You could also add mail.log to debug and be sure mail() is really called.
trans-unit.target: 参数 sendmail-path 描述了sendmail的调用方式。 缺省值为 sendmail -t -i ，因此，如果您在Linux控制台中得到了一个有效的 sendmail -t -i < message.txt ，则可以完成。 您还可以添加 mail.log 进行调试，并确保确实调用了mail（）。

trans-unit.source: Port block is a very common problem which most developers face while integrating their code to deliver emails using SMTP. And, this can be easily traced at the server maillogs (the location of server of mail log can vary from server to server, as explained above). In case you are on a shared hosting server, the ports 25 and 587 remain blocked by default. This block is been purposely done by your hosting provider. This is true even for some of the dedicated servers. When these ports are blocked, try to connect using port 2525. If you find that port is also blocked, then the only solution is to contact your hosting provider to unblock these ports.
trans-unit.target: 端口阻塞是一个非常常见的问题,大多数开发人员在使用SMTP整合他们的代码来发送邮件时都会遇到这个问题。而且,这可以很容易在服务器的邮件日志中找到(如上文所述,不同服务器的邮件日志的服务器位置可能会有所不同)。如果你是在共享主机的服务器上,默认情况下,25和587端口仍然被屏蔽。这是你的主机提供商特意设置的。即使是一些专用服务器也是如此。当这些端口被屏蔽时,请尝试使用2525端口连接。如果你发现这个端口也被封禁了,那么唯一的解决办法就是联系你的主机提供商来解封这些端口。

trans-unit.source: Provided your sendmail system works, your code must be modified as follows:
trans-unit.target: 只要你的sendmail系统正常工作,你的代码必须修改如下。

trans-unit.source: Reason: your web or sending mail server is not SPF/DKIM-whitelisted to pretend being responsible for @hotmail or @gmail addresses. It may even silently drop mails with From: sender domains it's not configured for.
trans-unit.target: 原因：您的Web或发送邮件服务器未列入SPF / DKIM白名单，以假装负责@hotmail或@gmail地址。 它甚至可能会默默地丢弃未配置发件人域的发件人的邮件。

trans-unit.source: Returns TRUE if the mail was successfully accepted for delivery, FALSE otherwise. It is important to note that just because the mail was accepted for delivery, it does NOT mean the mail will actually reach the intended destination.
trans-unit.target: 如果邮件已成功接受传递，则返回 TRUE ，否则返回 FALSE 。 重要的是要注意，仅仅因为邮件已被接受送达，并不意味着邮件实际上将到达预期的目的地。

trans-unit.source: See http://php.net/manual/en/mail.configuration.php for details. (It's best to enable these options in the php.ini or .user.ini or .htaccess perhaps.)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见http://php.net/manual/en/mail.configuration.php 。 （最好在 php.ini 或 .user.ini 或 .htaccess 中启用这些选项。）

trans-unit.source: See the official documentation for more information on how to use SwiftMailer.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用SwiftMailer的更多信息，请参见官方文档 。

trans-unit.source: See How do you make sure email you send programmatically is not automatically marked as spam? for more on this topic.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅如何确保以编程方式发送的电子邮件不会自动标记为垃圾邮件？ 有关此主题的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: See How can I get useful error messages in PHP? — this answer for more details on this.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅如何在PHP中获得有用的错误消息？ —有关更多详细信息， 请参见此答案 。

trans-unit.target: 发送到多个账户

trans-unit.target: 通过在你的脚本中加入这样的行来设置这个选项。

trans-unit.source: So FALSE will help point you in the right direction whereas TRUE does not necessarily mean your email was sent successfully. This is important to note!
trans-unit.target: 因此， FALSE 将帮助您指出正确的方向，而 TRUE 并不一定意味着您的电子邮件已成功发送。 重要的是要注意！

trans-unit.source: Some Web hosting providers do not allow or enable the sending of emails through their servers. The reasons for this may vary but if they have disabled the sending of mail you will need to use an alternative method that uses a third party to send those emails for you.
trans-unit.target: 有些虚拟主机提供商不允许或启用通过其服务器发送电子邮件。原因可能会有所不同,但如果他们禁止发送邮件,你需要使用其他方法,使用第三方为你发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: Some spam software will reject mail if it is missing common headers such as "From" and "Reply-to":
trans-unit.target: 有些垃圾邮件软件会在邮件中缺少常见的标题,如 "发件人 "和 "回信人 "等,就会被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the problem is as simple as having an incorrect value for the recipient of the email. This can be due to using an incorrect variable.
trans-unit.target: 有时候,问题很简单,就像邮件收件人的值不正确一样。这可能是由于使用了一个不正确的变量。

trans-unit.source: Standard sendmail package install (allowing 'send'):
trans-unit.target: 标准sendmail软件包安装（允许“发送”）：

trans-unit.source: The mail() function:
trans-unit.target: mail() 函数：

trans-unit.source: The mail($to, $subject, $message, etc.) in that order, or else there is a chance of it not working.
trans-unit.target: mail($to, $subject, $message, etc.) 按此顺序排列，否则有可能无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The above took about 5 minutes. Then I wasted 5 hours... Don't forget to check your spam folder!
trans-unit.target: 以上过程约需5分钟。 然后我浪费了5个小时... 别忘了检查您的垃圾邮件文件夹 ！

trans-unit.source: The mail function takes three required parameters and optionally a fourth and fifth one. If your call to mail() does not have at least three parameters it will fail.
trans-unit.target: 邮件功能需要三个必需的参数，还可以选择第四个和第五个参数。 如果您对 mail() 的调用没有至少三个参数，它将失败。

trans-unit.source: The way, how PHP mails, is described in php.ini in section [mail function].
trans-unit.target: php.ini 的 [mail function] 部分中描述了PHP如何发送邮件的方式。

trans-unit.source: There are a variety of reasons your script appears to not be sending emails. It's difficult to diagnose these things unless there is an obvious syntax error. Without one you need to run through the checklist below to find any potential pitfalls you may be encountering.
trans-unit.target: 有多种原因导致你的脚本似乎无法发送邮件。除非有明显的语法错误,否则很难诊断出这些问题。如果没有,你需要通过下面的检查表来查找你可能遇到的任何潜在陷阱。

trans-unit.source: There are several possibilities:
trans-unit.target: 有几种可能。

trans-unit.source: There are various delivery and spamminess checking services you can utilize to test your MTA/webserver setup. Typically you send a mail probe To: their address, then get a delivery report and more concrete failures or analyzations later:
trans-unit.target: 有各种送达和垃圾邮件检查服务,你可以利用这些服务来测试你的MTAwebserver设置。通常情况下,你发送一个邮件探针到:他们的地址,然后得到一个投递报告和更多的具体故障或分析。

trans-unit.source: This can apply to all of the mail() parameters.
trans-unit.target: 这可以应用于所有 mail() 参数。

trans-unit.source: This code works, but the email was received with half an hour lag.
trans-unit.target: 这个代码可以用,但收到邮件时,却迟了半个小时。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to send HTML-based emails.
trans-unit.target: 这使得您可以发送基于HTML的电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: This is important to note because:
trans-unit.target: 这一点很重要,因为:

trans-unit.source: This means you can then directly see the responses from the receiving server (in PHPMailer, for instance, you can turn on debugging output). No more guessing if a mail failed to send or why.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着您可以直接查看来自接收服务器的响应（例如，在PHPMailer中，您可以打开调试输出 ）。 无需再猜测邮件是否发送失败或原因。

trans-unit.source: This will only affect a small handful of users, but I'd like it documented for that small handful. This member of that small handful spent 6 hours troubleshooting a working PHP mail script because of this issue.
trans-unit.target: 这只会影响到一小部分用户,但我希望这一小部分用户都能知道。因为这个问题,这一小部分人花了6个小时排除了一个正常工作的PHP邮件脚本。

trans-unit.source: To avoid mail sent through PHP from being sent to a recipient's spam folder, there are various things you can do, both in your PHP code and otherwise, to minimize the chances your emails are marked as spam. Good tips from Michiel de Mare include:
trans-unit.target: 为避免通过PHP发送的邮件被发送到收件人的垃圾邮件文件夹，在PHP代码和其他代码中，您都可以做很多事情，以最大程度地减少将电子邮件标记为垃圾邮件的机会。 来自Michiel de Mare的好提示包括：

trans-unit.source: To check weather your hosting service support the mail() function, try running this code (remember to change the recipient email address):
trans-unit.target: 要检查您的托管服务是否支持mail（）函数，请尝试运行以下代码（切记更改收件人电子邮件地址） ：

trans-unit.source: To help rule out email account issues, send your email to multiple email accounts at different email providers. If your emails are not arriving at a user's Gmail account, send the same emails to a Yahoo account, a Hotmail account, and a regular POP3 account (like your ISP-provided email account).
trans-unit.target: 为了帮助排除电子邮件帐户问题，请将您的电子邮件发送到位于不同电子邮件提供商的多个电子邮件帐户。 如果您的电子邮件没有到达用户的Gmail帐户，则将相同的电子邮件发送到Yahoo帐户，Hotmail帐户和常规POP3帐户（例如ISP提供的电子邮件帐户）。

trans-unit.source: Try these two things separately and together:
trans-unit.target: 试试这两样东西分开来,也可以在一起。

trans-unit.source: Try this
trans-unit.target: 试试这个

trans-unit.source: Use '' and not "".
trans-unit.target: 使用 '' 而不是 "" 。

trans-unit.source: Use SMTP mails to send mail...
trans-unit.target: 使用SMTP邮件发送邮件.....

trans-unit.source: Use a different mailer
trans-unit.target: 使用不同的邮件

trans-unit.source: Use email authentication methods, such as SPF, and DKIM to prove that your emails and your domain name belong together, and to prevent spoofing of your domain name. The SPF website includes a wizard to generate the DNS information for your site.
trans-unit.target: 使用SPF和DKIM之类的电子邮件身份验证方法来证明您的电子邮件和域名属于同一类，并防止欺骗您的域名。 SPF网站包含一个向导，用于为您的站点生成DNS信息。

trans-unit.source: Use ports 25 or 587 for plain/TLS connections and port 465 for SSL connections. For most users, it is suggested to use port 587 to avoid rate limits set by some hosting providers.
trans-unit.target: 使用25或587端口用于纯TLS连接,465端口用于SSL连接。对于大多数用户来说,建议使用587端口,以避免一些主机提供商设置的速率限制。

trans-unit.source: Use the full, real name of the addressee in the To field, not just the email-address (e.g. "John Smith" <john@blacksmiths-international.com> ).
trans-unit.target: 在“收件人”字段中使用收件人的真实姓名，而不仅仅是电子邮件地址（例如 "John Smith" <john@blacksmiths-international.com> ）。

trans-unit.source: Various: http://www.verticalresponse.com/blog/7-email-testing-delivery-tools/
trans-unit.target: 各种： http ： //www.verticalresponse.com/blog/7-email-testing-delivery-tools/

trans-unit.source: Verification (of ability to send)
trans-unit.target: 核查(发送能力)

trans-unit.source: When the error suppression operator@ is prepended to an expression in PHP, any error messages that might be generated by that expression will be ignored. There are circumstances where using this operator is necessary but sending mail is not one of them.
trans-unit.target: 当错误抑制运算符 @ 前缀在PHP中的表达式中时，该表达式可能生成的任何错误消息都将被忽略。 在某些情况下，必须使用此运算符，但发送邮件不是其中一种。

trans-unit.source: While the mail must have a From: sender, you may not just use any value. In particular user-spplied sender addresses are a surefire way to get mails blocked:
trans-unit.target: 尽管邮件必须具有“发件人：”发件人，但您不能仅使用任何值。 特别是用户拼凑的发件人地址是一种阻止邮件的可靠方法：

trans-unit.source: Yes, I know, this is totally useless for real world email. However, from what I've seen, academic settings and the real world often have precious little in common.
trans-unit.target: 是的,我知道,这对现实世界的电子邮件完全没有用。然而,据我所见,学术环境和现实世界往往没有什么共同点。

trans-unit.source: You also get the benefit of a better interface. With mail you have to set up all your headers, attachments, etc. With a library, you have a dedicated function to do that. It also means the function is doing all the tricky parts (like headers).
trans-unit.target: 您还可以获得更好的界面的好处。 对于 mail 您必须设置所有标头，附件等。对于库，您必须具有专用的功能。 这也意味着该函数正在执行所有棘手的部分（例如标头）。

trans-unit.source: You are not getting the posted value. Try your code with a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你没有得到发布的值。试试你的代码用一个静态值。

trans-unit.source: You can also use SMTP to send your emails. See this great answer from Vikas Dwivedi to learn how to do this.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用SMTP发送电子邮件。 请参阅Vikas Dwivedi的 出色答案 ，以了解如何执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: You can overcome this by installing a basic mail server. For Windows you can use the free Mercury Mail.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过安装基本邮件服务器来克服此问题。 对于Windows，您可以使用免费的Mercury Mail 。

trans-unit.source: You can see your errors by:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过以下方式查看您的错误。

trans-unit.source: You can use config email by CodeIgniter. For example, using SMTP (simple way):
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过CodeIgniter使用配置电子邮件。 例如，使用SMTP （简单方式）：

trans-unit.source: You can use libmail: http://lwest.free.fr/doc/php/lib/index.php3?page=mail&lang=en
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用libmail： http ://lwest.free.fr/doc/php/lib/index.php3?page=mail&lang=en

trans-unit.source: You need to open the mail expansion, and set the SMTP smtp_port and so on, and most important, your username and your password. Without that, mail cannot be sent. Also, you can use the PHPMail class to send.
trans-unit.target: 您需要打开邮件扩展，并设置 SMTP smtp_port 等，最重要的是您的用户名和密码。 否则，将无法发送邮件。 另外，您可以使用 PHPMail 类进行发送。

trans-unit.source: You're facing a server problem. The server does not have any mail server. So your mail is not working, because your code is fine and mail is working with type.
trans-unit.target: 你面临的是服务器的问题。服务器没有任何邮件服务器。所以你的邮件是无法正常工作的,因为你的代码没有问题,邮件是用类型来工作的。

trans-unit.source: Your web server should be logging all attempts to send emails through it. The location of these logs will vary (you may need to ask your server administrator where they are located) but they can commonly be found in a user's root directory under logs. Inside will be error messages the server reported, if any, related to your attempts to send emails.
trans-unit.target: 您的Web服务器应该记录所有通过它发送电子邮件的尝试。 这些日志的位置会有所不同（您可能需要询问服务器管理员，它们位于何处），但是通常可以在用户根目录下的 logs 下找到它们。 服务器中报告的错误消息（如果有）与您尝试发送电子邮件的内容有关。

trans-unit.source: bool mail ( string $to , string $subject , string $message [, string $additional_headers [, string $additional_parameters ]] )
trans-unit.target: bool mail(string $to,string $subject,string $message [,string $additional_headers [,string $additional_parameters ]])

trans-unit.source: if you are on an Ubuntu server.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是在Ubuntu服务器上。

trans-unit.source: remove $from (just my gut)
trans-unit.target: 删除 $from （只是我的直觉）

trans-unit.source: remove the if($_POST['submit']){}
trans-unit.target: 删除 if($_POST['submit']){}

trans-unit.source: we added Content-type to express we return HTML so that you can compose better emails (you can add nay HTML code you want, including CSS, to your message as you would do in HTML page).
trans-unit.target: 我们添加了Content-type来表达我们返回HTML,这样你就可以写出更好的邮件(你可以像在HTML页面中一样,在你的邮件中添加你想要的HTML代码,包括CSS,也可以添加HTML代码)。

trans-unit.source: we built a header multilines string (each line separated by\r\n);
trans-unit.target: 我们建立了一个头的多行字符串(每一行都用空格分隔)。
